text: (nabiye!) apage dharmayan laba dun ayagen, kavurun eya samudiranaya kala yutu akarayata samudiranaya kara, (dÃ¦na) gena (anugamanaya) karannoda, ovun (suddha vu kuranaya vana) meyada (anivaryayenma) visvasa karannaha. namut (ovungen) kavurun ho meya pratiksepa kalahot ovun niyata vasayenma parajitayinma vannaha
